title: Cup, "Eighth of March", 1950–60
markings: underside: Krasnodarsk factory mark stamped in red overglaze
provenance: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection
creditline: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds
description: Cylindrical, with image of woman's face, an 8 made up of a globe and a flower, and the inscription "March."

tombstone.epitaph:
Cup, "Eighth of March", 1950–60.
1950–60. Porcelain, enamel, gilding. The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds. 1989-41-108.
